mapper.select: select id from INSBRiskkindconfig where datatemp = #{datatemp}

update INSBRiskkindconfig set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},type = #{type},riskkindname = #{riskkindname},riskkindcode = #{riskkindcode},prekindcode = #{prekindcode},isdeductible = #{isdeductible},datatemp = #{datatemp},isselected = #{isselected},selectkey = #{selectkey},isflag = #{isflag} where id = #{id}
